name: oj-bind-for-each
description: Binds items of an array to the specified markup section. The markup section is duplicated for each array item when element is rendered.

as.description:
An alias for the array item. This can be especially useful 
if multiple oj-bind-for-each elements are nested to provide access to the data 
for each level of iteration.

data.description:
The array that you wish to iterate over. Required property. Note that the <oj-bind-for-each> will 
dynamically update the generated DOM in response to changes if the value is an observableArray.
